page.title: 13Baldhu Church.
page.content: We were not allowed in to{Baldhu {Church}so we looked outside. It has three hundred graves. There is a ladder to get up to the tower.{Billy {Bray's}grave is three metres tall. There are three statues in the graveyard and three{Vicars}buried there. The church has only one entrance called 'Lich Gate'. There is also a Holy Well and a Spire which is eight metres high. The spire has got a cross used for showing which way the wind blows. The spire also has a Lightning Conductor. It has six bells in the tower. The church is not used anymore but people are still buried there. All the funerals are held at {Baldhu Chapel}and then they walk to {Baldhu Church}where they are buried.All the Weddings are held at Highertown Church.The church yard has recently be tidied and cleaned.
